posts.name: Nana
posts.cooked: Hii i want to design an elevator system and i need help How to start and how to design an elevator? Thanks

posts.name: Rocky
posts.cooked:
Check FRC . Design. Org

Aslo look at elevator kits like thrifty bot and WCP

posts.name: Ryan Dognaux
posts.cooked: Take a peek at this video that goes over sizing and building a cascading elevator lift.

posts.name: Lexeo
posts.cooked:
I’ll throw in the obligatory…if you don’t know how to do this, you might be better served with a COTS elevator. There are a bunch on the market.

Thrifty Elevator

Andymark Powered Elevator

Greyt Elevator

Thrifty elevator and Greyt elevator are mature designs that have been battle tested the past few years. The Andymark elevator is new, but is neat that you can run in cascade or continuous depending on how you do the rigging.

posts.cooked: Check Andymark’s elevator and there is some videos on Youtube to explain elevator system

posts.name: pogo
posts.cooked: I think you forgot to post the link

I would try looking at the NASA RAP Robotics Design Guide. They have most common mechanisms in there, including elevators.

NASA RAP Robotics Design Guide – Robotics Alliance Project
